text: Say, "Shall we pray to (something), besides God, that neither profits us nor harms us, and shall we turn back on our heels, after God has guided us, like him whom the devils have made to wander in the earth in a confused (state), while his companions call him towards guidance, "Come to us?" Say, "God's guidance is certainly the guidance, and we are commanded that we should submit to the Lord of the worlds
